name: Wall of Duty: Mexican Warfare VR
name_original: Wall of Duty: Mexican Warfare VR
description:
ANGRY BIRDS BUT WITH ANGRY MEXICANS AND YOU ARE THE PIGS IN VR. DEFEND YOUR BORDER! BUILD A WALL! MAGA! SHOOT GUNS! IN VR!

Also known as

Sombrero Slaughter Beaner Border Spic Span Shingeki no Mexicano For Which it Stands Shingeki no Taco Taquito Tower Mexican Warfare Trumps Simulator 2020

How to play

  • Only works with Oculus Rift and Oculus Touch or HTC Vive.
  • Do not let the Mexicans into USA. They will steal your jobs. You loose when no jobs are left in USA.
  • Build a great wall out of bricks and use your glue gun to glue them together.
  • The Mexicans will shoot themselves over your wall with their Mexicanons. Shoot them dead with your gun.
  • Grab and use the money magnet to pick up money. Drop into your defence budget, use lever to open.
  • Order new items from the website.
  • Sell your wall to regain money.

Keybinds

  • Use side button to grab items.
  • Use trigger to use items.
  • Point on screen and click to order item.
